name: Tex Mex Guacamole Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: avocado, corn, red onion, jalapeño, canned black bean, lime, salt, pepper, tortilla chips
recipeIngredient: ½ cup canned black beans, drained
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, combine the avocado, corn, red onion, jalapeño, black beans, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix together until fully incorporated.
